title: flashbacks & reminiscing
preview: 3 am. i spent the night confused, stalking my...., bruh cut the crap. do not trusasdasdast your thoughts after 11pm.

title: the art of debugging life
preview: sometimes fixing code is easier than fixing yourself. every error message teaches us something about persistence, patience, and the beauty of finally making things work.

title: why i fell in love with react
preview: it wasn't the syntax or the ecosystem. it was the moment i realized how components mirror life - how small, reusable pieces can create something beautiful and complex.

title: coffee shop chronicles
preview: the best ideas come in the most unexpected places. today's revelation came with a latte and a stranger's conversation about chasing dreams versus finding them.

title: from music to code
preview: how i transitioned creativity from music, art & style to software development and why it was the best plot twist my story ever had. sometimes the craziest combinations can lead to the amazing ideas/projects.

title: late night code sessions
preview: when the world sleeps, the best code awakens. there's something magical about 2 am debugging sessions - just you, your thoughts, and the gentle hum of possibility.
